title: Get domain expiry reminders with Google Sheets, WHOIS, Telegram, and Ollama AI
description: This workflow helps you monitor domain expiration dates and send automatedreminders via Telegram when a domain is about to expire or has already expired,using WHOIS data and AI-powered information extracting.It helps prevent service downtime, lost traffic, and missed renewals forindividuals and teams managing multiple domains.Common use cases: * Track and remind on agency-managed client domains * Monitor personal or business domain portfolios * Send automated expiry alerts for IT and DevOps teamsHOW IT WORKS * Runs daily at 08:00 AM * Reads domain data from Google Sheets * Fetches WHOIS information from whois.com [http://whois.com] for each domain * Extracts the data (expired date, domain owner, status domain) using AI * Sends a Telegram reminder if the domain expires within 90 days * Records the notification date to avoid duplicate alertsSETUP STEPS 1. Add your Google Sheets ID and ensure the required columns exist 2. Connect your Google Sheets credentials [https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlesheets] 3. Connect your Telegram credentials [https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.telegram/chat-operations] 4. Configure your LLM provider (Ollama or other) 5. Activate the workflowNEED HELP?Contact me on LinkedIn [https://www.linkedin.com/in/dwicahyas/]!
metadescription: Automate domain expiry monitoring with WHOIS + AI. Pull from Google Sheets, get Telegram alerts 90 days before/after expiry, avoid downtime.
summary:
- Monitor domain expiration dates automatically to avoid downtime, lost traffic, and missed renewals  
- Perfect for agencies, portfolio owners, and IT/DevOps teams managing multiple domains  
- Runs daily at 08:00 AM, pulling domain lists from Google Sheets  
- Fetches fresh WHOIS data from whois.com and uses AI to extract key details (expiry date, owner, status)  
- Sends Telegram alerts when domains are expired or expiring within 90 days  
- Logs notification dates to prevent duplicate reminders
